mapper.insert: insert into k_class_reg( class_id, course_id, prof_id, class_to, class_year, class_sem, class_syl, class_title ) values( #{classId}, #{courseId}, #{profId}, #{classTo}, #{classYear}, #{classSem}, #{classSyl}, default, #{classTitle} )
mapper.select: select * from k_class_reg order by class_id

SELECT c.class_id, j.major_name, u.user_name, co.course_title, c.course_id, co.course_type, co.course_credit, CONCAT(c.class_sem,'학기') as classSem, c.class_to, c.class_ck, c.class_syl
from k_class as c join k_course as co on c.course_id = co.course_id join k_users as u on u.user_id = c.prof_id join k_major as j on j.major_id = co.major_id where class_id not in (SELECT class_id from k_class_member where stu_id =#{userId}) order by class_id
